website_summaries.verdict: The ideal double leash for owners of larger dogs wanting a highly-functional product.
pros: Leash includes two, built-in, padded handles for each dog when extra control is needed
Stitching is reflective for nighttime walks
Height for each leash is adjustable
cons: A little heavy for small dogs
Leash can get tangled despite the tangle-free advertising

customer_reviews.title: Walking two Mastiffs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 Mastiff mixes. I like the adjustable length, G is fully grown, about 95 lbs, Benni is a 4 month old pup, 35 lb. both were easily able to walk side by side. Benni is still not used to walking on any leash, but I think he’ll learn faster with G to guide him. Very well made, sturdy stitching, the handles look useful, but I haven’t had to use them yet. Definitely strong enough for 2 Mastiffs.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Barclay

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Having two dog and walking them at the same time can be so difficult. I got to say I’ve been in so much tangle with two leashes. With the help of vaun Duffy double dog leash, I was able to hook up my 25lb husky and 12lb poodle next to each other and connect one leash, that I already owned. It has given me a better control with just one leach and the swivel at clips are helpful. Also when my husky start acting crazy I was able to get the soft hand to get more control. It does take time for the dogs to get use to it but be patient.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Weight makes it drag on the ground.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a simpler double dog leash. I like the idea of the looped handles in case I needed to get control of my two big dogs. It works fine. The only thing I don't like is that because of the handles it is weighted to the ground. Unless my dogs are pulling on the leash, it drags on the ground. I will use this some but will probably go back to my simple version that doesn't drag on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gates

customer_reviews.title: Best leash ever!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this leash for taking my dogs for walks through the the nature preserve near my home. One dog is 70 lbs and the other ones 40. They both pull like they're trying to drag a sled. And this is the best leash I've ever found. It gives them each enough length to feel like they're walking on their own but I'm able to keep them under control and pull them close if we come across other animals on the path and we need to go past each other. It's just a fantastic leash so glad that I spent the money! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Cheezhedgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Controlling Large Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, fantastic customer service from seller. Had a small problem with the original coupler I purchased, was going to take care of it myself. Seller happened to email me that day and I just let them know, was shipped a replacement immediately. Would definitely use this seller again. The coupler is being used to walk two full German Shepherd dogs, one is 100 lbs, the other "only" 60 lbs. It does what it says, let's me have control of both dogs, but also able to communicate via the handle to one or the other. Makes my life much easier and all three dogs enjoy their walks much more.
customer_reviews.author: Katsolo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have GS ,lab and a pit . I use it for the GS and lab - very comfortable! I love the individual PADDED handles and my older lab appreciates as well. My GS LOVES to randomly leap for rabbits and this leash helps me correct it before jerking my 11 year old lab. Very well made. I only wish the leashes were longer to adapt to the height difference of my smaller pit and GS. I have another double leash thats much longer accommodating not only difference in the height of the dogs but also the length of the main leash- but it does not have the padded individual handles that I absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: sl

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous coupler dog leash
customer_reviews.text: Loved this coupler! My two little girls are the same size. This coupler has a swivel joint ,so they can switch sides without getting tangled. Its sturdy, has handles at each end, so much fun to walk my two girls at the same time! Before, i had to take each dog out individually.. now we can all go together! I have three dogs, so it was 3 trips to the park. Some days , one dog would miss a turn. Now, that never happens!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had been trying to find a way to walk my two dogs at the same time. Tried several different leash combinations with no luck. I have a 55 lb Lab mix and a Bully puppy who's already 30 lbs going on 60+. Walking them at the same time became almost impossible. I Love this product. Came quickly, high quality, for a great price. Found out this came from a small family owned business in the US so that's an added bonus. I love the short handles, they are soft and make it easy to manage each dog separately with out having to use two leashes. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Two is as easy as one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. I had seen a man running a 5K with his two labs. I later had a conversation with him concerning how long it took for his dogs to learn how to run together, etc. He said the 5K was the first time he had used the double leash. All went well. The dogs took to it immediately. I ordered the double leash for my two Goldens, each about 70-80 lbs. It took me a little while to handle the leash, but the dogs did well immediately. The "key" is the swivel coupler! Magic for sure!!! It would be important for both dogs to be approximately the same size. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: kay knight

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this several times before I left a review. This is very well made and is very heavy material, not cheap at all. I have two American Bulldogs one grown and one is 5 months old. This leash works great. They don't get tangled and I use the straps quite often on the sides to control them especially when one is pulling. My one has went through training the other one is currently in training so the straps help to keep them in check. I highly recommend this to anybody with large or small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the leash is excellent..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to walk two Shih Tzu pups hoping it would allow me to have a free hand while walking both pups by myself...The quality of the leash is excellent...My pups adapted well to it right away...We completed our first walk, which included a narrow path and also an open field and I was so pleased. The swivel prevented "tangling" and the handles give reassurance that you can grab onto a pup quickly if one is unruly...This is a great leash...I am very happy with this purchase..and highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Spete

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, adjustable, quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design! As a dog trainer I've seen and used so many split leads, but this is my favorite! We have two giant breeds, and so even a little head turn can really start to wear on your wrists when walking two, but the comfort of these handles are great! Sometimes I use a leash with it, but honestly the handles are so comfortable that I usually just walk with the split lead alone. I value that each leash end is adjustable, and has its own handle making it easy to work with each dog individually. A great product. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Teall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leash and my dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: excellent coupler! It's amazing that the little hook that twist makes such a big difference. My dogs don't get tangled anymore and I'm not spending time trying to keep them in the same position. I wish I would have found this years ago. My dogs are 60 lbs each and they don't seem to have a problem with the leash. I purchased the short traffic handler as the leash to attach and now I can actually run without tripping over the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: "Heavy" duty, for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Warning. If you are using this harness with a retractable leash, medium or smaller, it will have a hard time retracting because this is so heavy duty. I find that this harness will just drag on the ground unless I help feed my leash back into the housing. The 5 stars is because this is made so well and it's not the company's fault that my retractable leash has a weak retract spring (Flexi leash). I am upgrading to a large size retractable leash to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: PSSSCS

customer_reviews.title: I🎶Love 🎶Walkin’ 🎶The 🎶Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have two border collie mix dogs. One 50 lb one 30 lb. We just finished our first 3 miler and it was great. I really like the separate handle loops for individual control, and I like that the length is adjustable for each side. It feels very sturdy, didn’t have any problem with tangles, and it has some weight to it but not a distraction. The dogs responded well to the new attachment. It’s so nice not to have to jockey two leashes. I didn’t buy the short leash, just put a knot on my old one. Works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mamahula

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for training to walk in "heel" position and "free" run.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for training. Attached a long leash for "free" time and was able to quickly bring dogs to "heel" near cars, other walkers, and a scary lawnmower. Comfortable to hold, minimal tangling. The only con is that it is a bit heavy for free time, but that is because of the added weight of padded handles and heavy hardware. Cleaned up quick. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Saragrace

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return this because I never use it. I find it way too heavy for my dogs, and they each weigh about 50 pounds and are Staffordshire Terrier mixes, so they are muscular and strong, but I find myself continually lifting my arms up in the air so it isn't too low to the ground. It's very sturdy and well made and I really like the fact that it has the 2 handles which is why I bought it, but I just don't find it easy to use or functional and I am a very experienced dog walker. I think for larger dogs this would be great, mine are just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me and my dogs-100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: The only leash coupler I will ever buy. Originally purchased 5+ years ago and after many years of use on of the metal parts on the clip broke. I messaged Vaun Duffy and they immediately replaced the coupler at no charge to me. The handles are comfortable and useful and I recommend it to anyone looking for a dog leash coupler. Such a great product made by a company with excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kyellowtruck

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: This leash does not work with front latch harnesses even though it shows pictures of dogs being walked with front latch harnesses. When I confirmed this and asked the company what type of back latch harness they recommend, they were not able to offer a recommendation nor does their company make a harness that complies with this leash. Needless to say, the leash is sitting in our closet unused. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: hs

customer_reviews.title: A must for two-dog owners
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Makes it so much easier to walk two dogs. You can adjust how far apart you want the dogs to be go (I chose farthest setting, to give them room). The handles are great, in case one is being a jerk and you need to grab them, or if there are dogs walking by and you just want that extra control of them both. I even attached my poop bags onto the loop in the middle. Best part: it swivels, do like so no matter how much they zig zag back and forth (and boy do my dogs do that), or never gets tangled or twisted. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tara H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS AMAZING! I have two big dogs (a husky and a German shepherd/great Dane mix) and it was a difficult to walk them together. I have a running leash that I would hook one on and I would use another leash to hook up the other one. They were always getting tangled. With this coupler they don't get tangled and I can still use my running leash I just connect the coupler to the leash and done! No more head ache and I like walking my dogs again! BEST THING EVER PURCHASED!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L

customer_reviews.title: Its good and strong
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I have a 116lb and 70lb dog on the end of this coupler and it is doing great and making things alot easier for me when i am walking 5 dogs (the other three are on a different coupler).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Great length.
customer_reviews.text: This changed the two-dog-walk game. I love it. The neoprene lined handles never get slippery (think sweaty hands on hot summer walks) so I never lose control. I love that I can hike both dogs up when crossing the street, or just control my one crazy one if we come across a negative stimulus. Just need to train them to walk side-by-side and quit dancing around each other, but hey, that's not the leash's fault. I have both sides fully extended for my 65# and 40# dogs and use the back hook on their double buckle harness. This way their necks get tangled less if they switch sides.
customer_reviews.author: mcatron

customer_reviews.title: Works with my two large huskies in the lead!
customer_reviews.text: Walks are fun again with my two Huskies. The coupler keeps them from getting tangled and seems to make them have a more consistent walk... one speeds up the other gets pulled... they figured it out real quick not to pull. I improved on it and I added a carabiner to the middle ring and make them carry their poo bags. It just hangs and doesn't move around as much as you would think. Been using for over 6 months and its still looking new.
customer_reviews.author: AFWxman

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. It's a heavy duty leash and easily supports my 65+50 lb dogs. I wouldn't recommend it if your dogs aren't well behaved as 100+ lbs of dog can really take it's toll if they are pulling hard. However, in my opinion, you will break before this leash will. In the case of my own dogs, they are excitable, but generally stay together and don't pull very hard unless there is something very interesting like a sneaky squirrel running right in front of them.
customer_reviews.author: IJC

customer_reviews.title: Broke on third use!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this product and loved many of it's features, unfortunately, the strap on one side snapped on the third use. Seller had too short of a return policy and I could not return or exchange it. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Fletchinger

customer_reviews.title: 2 Great Dane Mastiff puppies
customer_reviews.text: Control handles are close to walkers body for strong control. Padded handle feels good - average padding. Green is nice and bright, almost neon. Length is great, gives large dogs enough room but not to far that walker has low control. Holding well for my Dane/Mastiff pups (approx 200 lbs currently). Clippers were a little stiff at first but now are much smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and quality, but...
customer_reviews.text: The leash is great quality, and the mechanics work well, but for strong more hyper dogs, we don't use it. Went back to two leashes. Difficult for one dog to do their 'business' while the other is pulling another direction. For people 6' or taller, the leash is too short. I'd think it would work very well with smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: VOS

customer_reviews.title: Love the leash
customer_reviews.text: I finally used the double dog leash over the weekend and I am very satisfied with the performance of it. I currently have a 4 year and a 5 month American Bull Terrier that weigh over 130 pounds now. The fact that they love to rough-house even wearing the leash is awesome. I was never worried that it would break because when I received the item I noticed the quality of the design and material. I recommend this to anyone with larger dogs. At least I don't have to continually stop and untangle them both anymore
customer_reviews.author: Basha

customer_reviews.title: So many great features and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and can't wait to use it. Love the swivel. So many great features for a price that can't be beat. I researched a lot before ordering and feel I got a wonderful product for a great low price. Love the light reflecting strips as it get dark fast here in the mountains. I have no doubt this leash will keep my dogs very secure in my hands no matter what. Using this for my strong Staffies so needed something that gives me control.
customer_reviews.author: badaddidudeslady

customer_reviews.title: "HEEL"
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice ! I have a Cane Corso and a Hybrid that total over 250lbs. I was concerned at first glance. But i ordered this product anyway. Let me write that I AM BEYOND IMPRESSED. I thought the handles were super silly initially until a stray crossed my path in the distance. My dogs posted up and begin inching in the direction of the stray with me in towe. I grabbed hold of the handles and with very little effort; They heeled. They stayed on the ready. But heeled nonetheless and my arm and the stray is sooooo thankful. This company knows their stuff !
customer_reviews.author: RUMRUNNER2K5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, one of the best purchases I've made! Makes walking a breeze now, and very much to my surprise, both my girls caught on within seconds. I have 3 dogs, but used this product for two 50&55lb pit mixes. Before with three leashes and dogs wanting to go every which way possible, I dreaded walks, purely because of the tangles. They're not bad on leash, they are not bad pullers, but just want to go opposite ways. We just tried our first walk and I was beyond pleased! And I loved the handles incase I have to reinforce or wrangle them up, haven't tried them yet though. Good quality and heavy duty :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased multiple double dog leashes. I have two 95 lb Bernese mountain dogs and this double leash attachment is sturdy and very durable. I love the handles for each side, perfect for taking control in unsafe situations. My dogs never get tangled when using this. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Texter

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so my neighbor/petsitter could more easily walk her dog with mine. For the money, this is excellent quality! Both dogs are 60lb bully mixes who can PULL and play like crazy. This coupler doesn't tangle, and the slight bungee quality keeps them from yanking my arm off. The handles are greatly appreciated for holding one dog while attaching the other to the leash. So far it's held up to everything the dogs have thrown at it, and it feels very sturdy. Compatible with any regular leash, I wouldn't recommend using the coupler with a retractable leash as it's too difficult to control both dogs at that distance. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Witte

customer_reviews.title: Nice for walking two dogs
customer_reviews.text: I like it, my husband does not. It is heavy, so must be used with a regular leash, my husband tried to use it with an extenda leash which results in the swivel dragging along the ground. But, I use it with a regular leather leash and it works great. We prefer to walk our two dogs on separate extenda leashes, but when I take them alone, this leash is perfect. The dogs do have to get used to it. They are used to going in whatever direction they want, this leash makes them walk along together, which is great for me as I'm not getting tied up in leashes!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made- no more twisted leashes
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. One of my dogs likes to run around my other dog when we are all walking together. This was causing their two leases to get twisted. This seems to be really well made, heavy-duty and the swivel keeps them from getting twisted. I love that each side has a handle so that I can grab the more reactive dog and hold her next to me if she gets worked up about something. I need to get a slightly shorter leash to go with this- using my 4 foot leash just gives them a bit too much freedom to run wild. But, swapping that out for a 2-3 ft lead should make this perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MommyofTwo

customer_reviews.title: Dog walking life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This leash saved my dogs' hope for going on walks. I have two dogs and neither one can function being in front of NOR behind the other, but this split leash helps keep the playing field even-Steven. It's well-made and I trust the sturdiness, plus the handles for the separate sides are, well, handy! So, so glad I made this purchase and highly recommend it if your dogs are anything like mine and can't seem to walk together, separately. Oh, but look alive while you walk! My dogs love to try to take me out at the knees.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this years ago!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coupler!! It is sturdy and the dogs no longer get tangles between 2 leashes. It gives then enough room to be somewhat independent while walking them together. I love the handle, I've had to use it a few times. Best purchase in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Pami Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great double leash!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product! Virtually untangle-able! Gives me great freedom to walk two dogs, which would seriously be unmanageable with a traditional leash because my dogs are crazy. I love the two little handles that allow me to reign my dogs in when I need to. I can't speak for the ultimate longevity of it because I've only had it for a few weeks, but it FEELS solid and I think it will last. I've never used a double leash before, but seriously, I love this thing - and the price is great! Absolutely no regrets with my purchase. I would recommend this to anyone with two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Campos

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even begin to explain how thankful I am for this product. My dogs even walk better with it! And it’s so convenient only having to hold 1 leash. They don’t ever tangle up on eachother either. It’s a LIFESAVER. I have 2 pullers and this leash splitter has held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: mary castillo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: More then 5 stars I say. The quality is great. Easy to use. Comfortable. Makes it so much easier walking the dogs now. Highly recommend this. Cant say anymore of how much I love this. The handles are soft and have padding which is great. Help my direct both dog and helps with directing just one. And great control too
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: The plastic adjusters are the weak link
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome for 3 walks around the neighborhood. On the last walk my dogs (one @100lb and one @30lb) got really excited about some dogs going the other way and the plastic piece that allows you to adjust the length broke :( so sad! The dogs stayed tethered, but I cant trust it wont snap all the way off next time. I was really enjoying having one leash and not having the dogs pulling me in opposite directions all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MB girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing and company!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help walk my two beagles. They sniff a lot while walking and frequently cross each other's paths. This lead never gets tangled up. I absolutely love it! One of the plastic brackets for adjusting it broke and when I contacted the company they sent out a replacement within a week. I love this lead and love the integrity of the company that stood behind it. Can't recommend this highly enough!! If you walk multiple dogs, you really need this!!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug88

customer_reviews.title: Strong, thick, and fantastic for walking my two large dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash! My dog chewed through half of the first one so I bought a second. It lasted much longer since I learned to fasten the chewer second. It’s thick and strong. I love that my dogs don’t get tangled. It works great for our long walks we take every day. It’s much easier than using two separate leashes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brackeen

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a present for my nephews two Boston Terriers. He finds it a convienance to walk the two dog while holding one leash. Adjustable length allows for more walking distance for the dogs. The handles are strong. After looking for a strong double leash coupler, I saw the one from Vaun Duffy. It looked strong and well made. When I received it, it was exactly what I had been looking for. Am very happy with the product from Vaun Duffy. Product is as described. Will look for other products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Cleocatra

customer_reviews.title: Handy and mostly well-designed. 80%
customer_reviews.text: Very handy. I love it. The swiveling action is so helpful. The dogs can do whatever and I don't have to untangle them. I use so much less cognitive juice now, leaving more for emotional regulation for when the young one is barking her head off. I can write this review in one hand and hold the leash in the other. Unfortunately, the slider that adjusts the length broke. How that could happen is beyond me. Also, the padded handle is one-sided, so if I don't hook the dogs in in the right order, the handle is on the underside of the leash. Also I wish it came in other colors. I want to co-ordinate colors on collars. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs that pull hard
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, but my puppies pull too hard to use it safely. Pulling is harder to handle with them on one leash--too much concentrated pull power using this. Would work great for dogs who don't pull hard.
customer_reviews.author: Nittany Lion

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking two medium or larger dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coupler to walk two dogs as once that I have ever used. It positions the dogs at an angle to one another so they do not get tangled like on ones I have previously used. I even attach another extender with a third dog and they all walk without much of an issue. It would probably be a bit heavy for little dogs but for medium or larger dogs it is great!
customer_reviews.author: DACOW

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Doesn’t tangle much.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Good hasps. My dogs wear a harness and this attaches above their back. It works really good. It’s much easier to walk them with a single leash. They rarely get tangled. Careful not to let your dogs get behind you and come forward on either side. They could take you out at the knees.
customer_reviews.author: NCHTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The measure of a company is how they respond to an issue, Van Duffy gets A+++
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the handles are GREAT & love the swivel. What prompted me to write the review though was the support. I had an issue with the product and emailed the company through Amazon. I had a reply within 20 minutes and the issue was resolved perfectly within an hour. The measure of a company is how they respond to an issue
customer_reviews.author: Neale Fetterly

customer_reviews.title: Makes walking the dogs way easier.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well made, and doesnt tangle. Ita about 4 feet wide when dogs spread apart, 2 feet joint 2 feet. I love the handles which are also heavy duty. My dogs who hated walking when i had 2 leashes, worked well together.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRam

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and makes walking my two BIG dogs a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and makes walking my two BIG dogs a breeze. I have a rottweiler and a lab and the looped reinforced handles make it easy to "choke up" on the leash when they see another dog, squirrel, or any other distraction. Really love this product. Thanks Vaun Duffy!
customer_reviews.author: KHK

customer_reviews.title: Great product; not for me
customer_reviews.text: My dogs don’t walk ahead of me, they each walk on one side, so this was hard to manage. I always felt like I was going to trip over it. However, if they did walk ahead this would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best dog leash
customer_reviews.text: this leash is very well made. Its thick and well stitched. It does not tangle despite my dogs (70 lb. and 45 lb shepherd mixes) wrestling while walking. The padded handle is comfortable and its a good length.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: She is a great walker and not too big
customer_reviews.text: This thing is probably saving my life. I have a two-year-old Blue Heeler/Great Pyr/Dalmatian. She is a great walker and not too big. But we got these two (brother and sister) Great Pyr/Lab mixes and that are 60lbs at 5 months. Good god walking was a nightmare. But this thing lets us walk all three dogs at once. VERY well made I can attest to that. This is the coupler you are looking for /waving hang.
customer_reviews.author: Shofners

customer_reviews.title: Never tangles. Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome solution to walking two dogs. And works well with my two that are different weights and temperaments—one 45 pounds and high puppy energy; one 75 pounds and steady-as-he-goes. Update—absolutely love this! Coupler never tangles. Handles are great for when I need to walk with a dog on each side for ‘heel’ time.
customer_reviews.author: LitChic

customer_reviews.title: No Tangle Mess!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this a several times and so far this product has been great! One of my favorite features is that the two separate leashes do not tangle- if one puppy decides to go across, or they both decide to jump on top of each other to get to the other side, the top part of the leash swivels easily- no readjustment needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for walking 2 dogs
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully- the only way to walk two dogs. The construction is excellent; the dogs do not get tangled no matter how active. I'd only request that the individual leases were slightly longer to better accommodate my big (75 lb) and small (12 lb) dog. It still works great: if your dogs are closer in size, it will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for small (under 15 lb) dogs
customer_reviews.text: Not for small, miniature pups. The leash is well-made and sturdy. It looks to be very durable. My dogs are 10 and 14 lbs. This leash is much too heavy for them. My smallest boy would not walk because of the heft of the leash. It’s too bad because I really liked it but I think the leash is better suited to larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: victoria k.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have a 35lb border collie mix and a 85lb lab/husky mix. Both of the pups are under 1.5 years old and have a lot of energy. It's difficult to walk them in general and we are working on training but this leash was perfect for the both of them. I felt safe using it and it worked great for them and all of their back and forths. I highly recommend. If needing to keep them close I could grab the extra straps as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cali R

customer_reviews.title: if you walk multiple dogs, this leash will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: This changed my life lol. I have two dogs and take temporary foster dogs regularly. Walking three dogs is hard work! This leash allows me to be able to hold one leash for two dogs, while still allowing for more control if needed with handles. I've had other double leashes in the past that did not have the handles, and I'd never go back to that. This leash is amazing. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my two Goldendoodles, one is 85lb (1yr old) the other is 25ish lbs (6mo old). I love the tangle free feature of the leash, not to mention the hardware and material used feels very high quality. I LOVE the handles for additional control, don't think I'd ever get another leash without them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-designed leash coupler
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty leash coupler, which is exactly what I was looking for. The leash part is thick material, but not too bulky. I initially bought a generic one from a major pet store, but ended up returning it becuase it wasn't strong enough for my two goldens. I'm glad I trusted other reviews for this coupler....it really is a quality, well-designed product. The handles are useful to help my pups sit when other people/dogs walk by. I will certainly be checking out other Van Duffy products in the future! Thanks for a sturdy leash coupler!
customer_reviews.author: MJOY

customer_reviews.title: Great for two big dogs and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs, a 50lb border collie mix and a 75lb lab. They are the same height, so I wasn’t worried about the leash not accommodating that, but it will if you do have dogs of varying heights. It has a lot of room to adjust accordingly. I love how there are two COMFORTABLE handles on the leash splitter. It came in very handy. I also like how its hard for my dogs to get tangled up because the leash pivots in every direction. I’m always hiking with both dogs so it’s been a lifesaver and I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Strongly made but light enuff for 8 lb dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is ingenious! I bought 2 as we have 5 little breed dogs and this makes handling them SO much easier than everyone being on a separate leash and getting tangled! I thought I wouldn’t like the looped handle in the middle but it has proved to be extremely helpful & necessary when I have needed better control in a hurry! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Weinert

customer_reviews.title: Love this double leash
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other double dog leash and they couldn't hold up to my 70 pound Chessie and 140 pound Great Dane. However this leash held up like a champ and makes walking my 3 dogs a simple, enjoyable activity! Definitely recommend for anyone needing to walk more than one dog at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kari P.

customer_reviews.title: Double the fun
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a few days ago and haven't tried it yet, but I am very impressed with the quality. It is well made and attractive. I like the added handles on each side for extra control if needed. I have no doubt this will be a good addition to our walks.
customer_reviews.author: Celticreds5

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have two 60 lb pups that are both about a year old, and this has been a lifesaver. One pulls and the other lags behind... this keep balance between them and takes the load off me! The clasp are very heavy duty, and they have room to grow without fear of them outgrowing this leash. The handles also make it very easy to grab and control my social butterfly pup during trips to PetSmart. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best double leash!
customer_reviews.text: This leash is great. I have 2 big dogs and walking both at once can be difficult, but it’s much better with this leash. I like that they don’t get tangled because of the swivel. I also like the short handle that I can hold if I need to get a closer control on them.
customer_reviews.author: JMe

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a few months of semi-regular use. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.text: As it seems others have experienced, our leash coupler broke where the plastic buckles are for shortening/lengthening the individual leash sides. It seemed awesome at first, but this thing is not made to last and the manufacturer does not support it long term for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This double leash is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This double leash is great!!! I originally bought it because I had them on seperate leashes which was working great until we encounter a distraction (other dogs, squirrels, cranes, people walking, etc.) our 8yr old black lab is a lot worse on walks than our 4 month old husky and therefore it helps him to keep on track knowing he will just drag our husky along if he steers towards a distraction! They walk perfect on this leash while still having wiggle room to sniff the ground and go potty! Definitely recommend to anyone with two dogs!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie higgins

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something that lets me walk my two boxers at the same time! They can twist around each other and it keeps the pressure off me and puts more pressure on them. There were no problems with bathroom breaks for them and we finally all enjoyed a walk. This product works!
customer_reviews.author: johnodie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love it, only thing that would make it better is the option to buyouts anhandle that attaches. I like to keep my pups close while walking to the dog park.
customer_reviews.author: kdav99

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash. Used it on 2 large dogs (lab mix 100+ lbs and Great Dane 100+ lbs). It did not get tangled. Handled well with large dogs. And the extra handle in case they pull is great. Seems durable and will not break easily. I would highly recommend this product. Just wish it came with the handle and didn't need another separate leash.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kanekoa

customer_reviews.title: This thing is life saving!
customer_reviews.text: This leash is so cool! Combined with the pronged training collars it made a previously impossible task possible. They wouldn't behave on a leash AT ALL before the metal collars, they practically ripped my arms off. With new collars they walk nicely but having two leashes at a time if I am walking them alone was almost impossible. This thing allows for one handed walking of two big GSDs without hassle! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: E. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Great item for multiple dog household!
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time tonight. The product looks as nice as it does in the photos and feels like it’s made really well. The straps are adjustable but I wouldn’t put them too short so your dogs have enough space that they aren’t attached to each other. The swiveling metal attachment works perfectly, they could swap sides without getting tangled. The only thing is I am going to get a shorter leash. My greyhounds like to walk close to me and with this addition I had way too much material! Great product tho I’m very glad I bought it I will look at their other items for my pups!
customer_reviews.author: BKat88

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient for potty time
customer_reviews.text: Great concept until your please make sure the dogs are taken care of have to go potty. They can’t go more than a foot and a half from each other
customer_reviews.author: Brienne Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Walking is a dream now
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 65lbs dogs & this is such a lifesaver for walking them by myself. Haven’t had any issues so far and it’s been almost a year. I like that you can adjust the length of each side for the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately for no reason
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when one of my dogs chewed through their regular leash and was really happy with my purchase at first. The handles are great for handling an active pup and comfortable on your hand Within one month the clips had broken for no reason other than it being poorly made. When I tried to exchange in I learned that returns aren’t allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love the design but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Update, January 2019. I did purchase a second one, because I still like the design. The first buckle broke within 3 weeks of use. I don't think that my dogs or my use of the product are in any way exceptional, it's just poorly made. Too bad. This was a great coupler at first. The additional handles are helpful and it was generally comfortable and convenient to use with my two 70-lb dogs. But within half a year one of the buckles that allows the length of each leash to be changed broke, and within one year both broke. Very disappointed but I can't afford to replace this every year, so I'll have to find a different one.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Great buy,worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used it with two dogs for a combined weight of 220lbs, and it works great! Will always use this brand. Great quality as well. I don't think I'll be needing to buy a new one in a long time. I used with the Atlin Dog Leash 4 ft because I don't want there to be too much length with two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Gunkel

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This has made walking my dogs so much easier. I have an 85 pound Shepard mix and a 73 pound Lab mix and it holds them no problem. The Shepard is usually all over the place (he's still being leash trained) and my Lab helps me keep his crazy to a minimum now.
customer_reviews.author: MeganFromLV

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, good quality material. Love the added handle. It really is tangle free. I have 2 5month old pups already 35lbs+ and they constantly are going under and over and switching spots which was a headache with two leashes, this totally makes walking them easier. The only suggestion I have would be to make the rings above the handles into snaps instead so you detach one dog if needed.
customer_reviews.author: danielle p.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: How does this work?  Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely do not know how this works so well, but it does! I have two 4 mo old standard poodles and they never tangle! Goes great with the beautiful leash!! If I could do one thing to make this even better it would be to make it so they could be used separately as well.
customer_reviews.author: Judah's Darling

customer_reviews.title: Works best with 2 similar-sized dogs
customer_reviews.text: This works well for 2 dogs of similar size, but did not work very well when trying to walk our 30lb and 65lb dog at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Morris

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have two smaller dogs that would constantly get tangled up when going for walks. This allows the dogs to cross each other's paths and never get tangled. So great!
customer_reviews.author: Soil

customer_reviews.title: This is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say how much I love this! It really makes walking two dogs ( 90lbs and 45lbs.) at the same time much easier. Great quality! The traffic handles a great addition to the coupler, and the the swivel hardware prevents tangling and twisting.
customer_reviews.author: MsEnglishTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Great control
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coupler for my american bulldog (85lb) and staffy (40lb). I love being able to adjust it to keep them aligned. Unlike my previous coupler this one doesn't tangle. It is also super nice to have the two handle. In crowded areas myself and my husband can grab ahold for maximum control.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea B.

customer_reviews.title: Strong leash, excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new leash! My dogs are about 28 lbs, and are very strong. This leash enables me to have very good control of them while walking for an hour. I highly recommend this product! I bought the leash for larger dogs because mine are so strong, and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stitching on handle popped after a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on the lower handle popped after just a few walks. The grips were comfortable and the dual leash was great for walking my two dogs but unfortunately the quality did not hold up. Note - My dogs are well trained and do not pull.
customer_reviews.author: Mojave760

customer_reviews.title: Best double dog leash
customer_reviews.text: This double leash is wonderful. My dogs are easier to handle on this leash compared to a single leash, the dogs don't seem to pull as much. No more getting tangled up. The double handles are great when you need to have your dogs closer to you. My dogs love going on walks and the double leash makes it easier and more enjoyable for the three of us, this double dog leash coupler is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for larger dogs but not for my 2 small ones.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to walk my 2 Shih Tzus - one 9 lbs one 7.5 lbs. it is too heavy and weighs them down so that none of us enjoy our walks with it as I am always trying to hold it up for them.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Knight

customer_reviews.title: The pop of neon green is nice too. Materials are very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Worth the few extra dollars to get a quality dog coupler. The swivel is essential and makes walking two same sized dogs much easier. The pop of neon green is nice too. Materials are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the product on my end and received excellent customer service to help me out! My dog is a chewer and I'm hoping he won't be able to chomp his way through this item!
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: They love it and so do we!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Durable, strong, well made, and the color looks exactly like what I ordered. Best of all they love it. This is the first dual leash we’ve used on them and I don’t know why it took us so long to get one. But we’re glad we bought this one. It’s everything I wanted and hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Napoleon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good and sturdy leash. Its hard to tell from the pictures but the swivel link on this thing is quite hefty. I was a little worried when I ordered it that it might not be sufficient for my two dogs who weigh about 100 lbs together. As soon as I pulled it out of the packaging my worries went away and I have had no problems. It's nice being able to take both my dogs on jogs with me without worrying about being tied up or pulled in opposite directions.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This leash has worked very well for us. There are just a couple of small drawbacks. Overall it is quite heavy. Also, to work properly, the dogs need to walk in front of you and take the slack out of the leash. I'd recommend a very short connecting leash for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I was excited about this but it just made for a very annoying dog walk
customer_reviews.text: This leash is made well but unfortunately it does not give the dogs much room to move apart from each other. If one is doing their business, the other ends up pulling them. I was excited about this but it just made for a very annoying dog walk. Only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for large breeds
customer_reviews.text: I have two huskies and this is wonderful to use on our runs! Very heavy duty with no worries of it snapping. However I’m a paranoid husky owner and have had lease clasps break and then had to chase huskies so that being said I use climbing carabiners instead of the leash clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Two Dogs with Independent Active Levels
customer_reviews.text: This double leash looks like quality from opening and should last me for years. The adjustable lines are more useful than I initially thought of (I like symmetry). After using a few times, I found that one dog tends to pull more than the other and the second dog eventually got frustrated (being yanked from two directions). So I adjusted the more active dog to have a shorter leash and the other leash to be longer. It worked perfect, I can control the more active dog from the main leash and the less active dog is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Mack

product_meta.title: Vaun Duffy Double Dog Leash
product_meta.description:
Size:Over 35 Lbs| Color:BlackThanks for Checking Out Vaun Duffy's Double Dog Leash Coupler with With Two Padded Handles.
With so many different features we think we covered all the options your looking for in a coupler leash.

FEATURES

REFLECTIVE STITCHING
✓ The entire coupler leash has reflective stitching for night time safety.Great for those evening walks.

2 NEOPRENE SOFT PADDED HANDLES
✓ Includes two attractive dual fluorescent green neoprene padded handles on each side of the leash. Easily control each dog when needed while at the same time protecting your hands from heavy pulling dogs. Perfect for busy intersections and streets

NO TANGLE SWIVEL
✓ Each coupler leash has a specially designed swivel to keep your dogs from getting tangled up. If your dogs are constantly crossing paths this no tangle swivel is a great feature to have. 

MADE OF TOP QUALITY SUPER STRONG WEATHER PROOF NYLON THAT IS 1 INCH WIDE AND ADJUSTABLE 18-24 INCHES
✓ Have two dog's that are different heights? No problem, each side of leash can adjust to your dogs height. At one inch wide this double leash can handle large and medium dog breeds with no problem.

Made for X-Large , Large and Medium Dog Breeds

LIFETIME GUARANTEE : We guarantee it, and we mean it. This is not a 30 day or 6 month keep your receipt “warranty”. We believe so strongly in the superiority of our product that we back it with a lifetime guarantee. If one of our coupler leashes ever fails due to materials or workmanship a replacement coupler leash will be provided.

If you want a coupler leash with all the right features click the buy button now for a versatile well made double dog leash.
feature_bullets: TWO SOFT PADDED NEOPRENE HANDLES ON EACH SIDE OF COUPLER LEASH: When walking 2 dogs it's important for their safety to be able to control each dog when needed. Works great for busy streets and intersections.
REFLECTIVE STITCHING FOR NIGHT TIME SAFTY: Feel safe and be seen at night when walking your dogs. REFLECTIVE DUAL STITCHING on front and back of coupler leash.

SPECIFICALLY MADE FOR LARGE AND MEDIUM DOG BREEDS: This is a one of a kind strong heavy duty 1 inch wide dual coupler leash with all the features your looking for. Have two dog's that are different heights? No problem, each side of leash can adjust to your dogs height. Made specifically for large and medium dogs.
NO-TANGLE SWIVEL: Each coupler leash has a specially designed high quality swivel to keep your dogs from getting tangled up.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE : We guarantee it, and we mean it. This is not a 30 day or 6 month keep your receipt “warranty”. We believe so strongly in the superiority of our product that we back it with a lifetime guarantee. If one of our coupler leashes ever fails due to materials or workmanship a replacement coupler leash will be provided.
